Test Steps.Step Expected: The email should contain the reset link, expiration time, and any necessary instructions for the user.

Test Steps.Step Action: Click on the password reset link in the email.
Test Steps.Step Expected: The link should redirect to a secure Okta password reset page.

Test Steps.Step Action: Enter the new password (e.g., Test@1234) and confirm it.
Test Steps.Step Expected: The Okta system should accept the password and display a success message (e.g., "Password updated successfully").

Test Steps.Step Action: Attempt to log in with the new password.
Test Steps.Step Expected: Login should succeed using the updated credentials.
